data.text: Bigger, faster and (in our opinion) cuter than Rudolph. ✈️🦌 If you spot our Red Nosed AirDeer in the skies over Europe, don't forget to tag your pictures with #LXAirDeer to get reposted.📸#flyswiss #repostsoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/kYKxv8lPvX

data.text: For the start of the LXmas season, we have enchanted our Airbus A320neo HB-JDC with a red Christmas nose.🔴Keep your eyes wide open in the skies over Europe because you may soon be able to wave to our AirDeer yourself. And don't forget to tag the proof photo with #LXAirDeer🦌🎄 https://t.co/5o34eyeRgz

urls.title: SWISS and Switzerland Tourism promote carbon-neutral air travel
urls.description: SWISS and Switzerland Tourism are to extend their long-standing collaboration to the sustainability field.

data.text: Together with @MySwitzerland_e we extend our long-standing collaboration to the sustainability field. 🤝Switzerland Tourism will become the first Swiss tourism organization to make a substantial contribution to promoting carbon-neutral air travel:  https://t.co/EllRLefxxS https://t.co/Z3ie3bo6sM

urls.title: Fly carbon neutral
urls.description: Let’s make a difference – together we can protect the environment. Simply book your contribution on your next trip.

data.text: Same age, same goal, 15 years as partners: We congratulate @myclimate on its 20th birthday and at the same time toast our partnership, thanks to which we've already been able to support many sustainable projects. That's how you can offset your next flight: https://t.co/oI2eRY83g2 https://t.co/d0MKUMx0La

data.text: Lisbon is the capital and the largest city of Portugal.🇵🇹 It is also one of the oldest cities in the world, predating other modern European capitals by centuries.🏰 Starting in November, we are flying 14 times a week from Zurich to Lisbon. urls.title: SWISS reintroduces duty-free shopping on board
urls.description: SWISS is reintroducing its inflight duty-free shopping, which was suspended for the past two-and-a-half years in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

data.text: Duty-Free Shopping is back!✈️From now on, you can shop for our offers on flights of 55+ minutes. Our products, such as sunglasses, watches & deodorants, reflect every journey's diversity.😎⌚Find the perfect souvenir – for your loved ones or yourself.🎁https://t.co/DV2o2D1JXn https://t.co/rJGBMkQ5DV

urls.title: SWISS reports a strong third quarter
urls.description: With favourable market conditions in the summer months and efficiency gains through its restructuring activities, SWISS has seen its business recovery receive further thrust.

data.text:
With favourable market conditions in summer and efficiency gains through our restructuring activities, we've seen our business recovery receive further thrust: In the first nine months of 2022 we achieved an operating result of CHF +287.5 million. ✈️
More: https://t.co/IT5Y7G5z7R https://t.co/ImdEgZk6nE

urls.title: SWISS and SBB add tourist destinations Lucerne and Interlaken to their SWISS Air Rail network
urls.description: SWISS is further expanding the SWISS Air Rail network together with the Swiss Federal Railways.

data.text: Together with SBB, we have added two new SWISS AirRail destinations to our map: Lucerne and Interlaken.🚄This expands our mobility network, which will take our guests to selected stations from Zurich Airport and back again.✈️ For more info: https://t.co/rfOqHOYsey https://t.co/svcuY9aMFg

urls.title: SWISS keeps focus on scheduling stability for Summer 2023
urls.description: Zurich Airport, 18 October 2022 Route network SWISS keeps focus on scheduling stability for Summer 2023 SWISS will further expand its flight schedules as planned and continue to focus on the...

data.text:
Our summer timetable for 2023 (26MAR-28OCT) has arrived. ☀️
It's packed with Italian dolce vita, cool Nordic and other atmospheric destinations. Rest assured that we have a destination in store for your individual adventures. 🏜️🌏🥾🧳✈️
More info: https://t.co/R7pNcGgWSs https://t.co/27GJpTaFxR

urls.title: AeroSHARK – how we further reduce our flights’ carbon emissions with a new technology » SWISS Blog
urls.description: We are the first passenger airline in the world to take advantage of the new AeroSHARK aircraft skin technology to further reduce the carbon dioxide

data.text:
Smoothly to its destination: as of now, water AND air are the favourite elements of our AeroSHARK. ✈️ 🦈
We are the first passenger airline in the world to use the new "AeroSHARK" technology to further reduce our CO2 emissions and fuel consumption: https://t.co/Txl8E5PdrG https://t.co/rFrHDmJF4P

Sharks aren’t just great swimmers, now they can fly too. 🦈✈️
Our AeroSHARK is officially checked-in. 😉

As the first airline in the world we use a new technology to further reduce CO2 emissions & fuel consumption. 
#AeroSHARK #MakeChangeFly #Innovation

urls.title: AeroSHARK – how we further reduce our flights’ carbon emissions with a new technology » SWISS Blog
urls.description: We are the first passenger airline in the world to take advantage of the new AeroSHARK aircraft skin technology to further reduce the carbon dioxide

data.text: We use innovative technologies to make flying more sustainable🦈✈️Today we became the first airline in the world to deploy the AeroSHARK technology, which replicates the skin of a shark to reduce aerodynamic drag and lower fuel consumption & CO2 emissions: https://t.co/Txl8E66Oje https://t.co/3sTAP1jKOY

urls.title: SWISS and Breitling team up to promote sustainable fuels
urls.description: SWISS and Swiss watch manufacturer Breitling have entered into a new partnership which is the first of its kind in Switzerland. Under the new arrangement, Breitling will purchase sustainable...

data.text: Together with @Breitling, we have entered into a partnership which is the first of its kind in Switzerland. Breitling will purchase Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) for all its work-related travel with SWISS. Further information can be found here: https://t.co/U6La1jqbqa #flyswiss https://t.co/65jLQ4d0FB

urls.title: SWISS Saveurs
urls.description: With SWISS Saveurs, we offer you a wide range of culinary delicacies for every palate on most fl ights. Our new culinary concept on flights from Zurich and Geneva is a reflection of our commitment to serving you meals that are regional and delicious. The selection includes a range of healthy alternatives, is made from regional ingredients and comes in sustainable packaging whenever possible. The range of fresh products was created by Switzerland’s world-renowned Confiserie Sprüngli, which can look back

data.text: Our SWISS Saveurs menu goes into a new round for the fall starting September 1st. 🍂 One of the highlights are our new French "fries in the skies" with mayonnaise or vegan ketchup🍟. You can find the full menu here: https://t.co/7xuC65T4G0 #SWISSSaveurs #flyswiss https://t.co/uibEvqudGV

urls.title: SWISS posts first-half operating profit of CHF 67 million
urls.description: SWISS returned to profit in the first six months of 2022 and posted an operating result of CHF 67.0 million for the period. The encouraging business developments that had been seen in the first...

data.text: We returned to profit in the first six months of 2022 and posted an operating result of CHF 67.0 million for the period. Despite the likelihood of an economic slowdown, we are confident of returning to profit in our 2022 full-year results. More info: https://t.co/wmACiBJRZZ

Ever since she was little, aviation has been a big topic in her life: our Instagrammer of the month & flight attendant Fabienne grew up just a few metres from the airport and followed her gut feeling. ✈️ On Instagram @flyswiss she takes you along on her exciting life. #flyswiss

urls.description: We treat you to the highest comfort in the nine SWISS lounges at Zurich Airport, whether before your departure, during a transfer or on arrival. Be our guest.

Treat yourself to the highest comfort in one of our lounges at @zrh_airport & enjoy our many culinary delights or get work done in our designated workspaces. For further information and opening hours: https://t.co/oyt4ztpqJ3 #flyswiss https://t.co/oGQxVtL4mu

data.text: We’re celebrating our 20th anniversary with one last printed issue of our SWISS Magazine, which is available on board until the end of September. 🥳✈️ Find 20 tips for European summer destinations🏖, employee stories with a glimpse behind the scenes 🔧 & many more stories here:
Window-💺is the best seat – especially when you get to see our wings. 🛫 Tag us with #flyswiss and show us your best wing shot. 📸 #repostsoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/eTvsV2349u

urls.title: SWISS & Synhelion - Nachhaltige Transformation der Luftfahrt
urls.description: Listen to this episode from ecozentrisch on Spotify. Sommerzeit – Reisezeit!Nach über zwei Jahren der Pandemie und den anstehenden (oder schon gestarteten) Sommerferien, heißt es für viele Familien Koffer packen und ab in den Urlaub. Was in manch einer Kindheit noch mit dem eigenen Auto geleistet wurde, findet inzwischen zum großen Teil mit dem Flugzeug statt. Vor allem dann, wenn eine Fernreise auf dem Programm steht.Aber wie nachhaltig ist es denn überhaupt, mit dem Flugzeug zu fliegen? Angesichts der Tatsache, dass die Luftfahrtindustrie gerade einmal für 2,5% der globalen CO2-Emissionen verantwortlich ist, könnte man durchaus behaupten, dass der Impact relativ gering ist. Dennoch arbeitet die Branche umfangreich an weiteren Verbesserungen.Welche das sind und wie Europa hier eine Vorreiterrolle einnehmen kann, darüber spricht unser Chief Awareness Officer Sascha Pallenberg mit dem SWISS CEO Dieter Vranckx und Synhelion CEO Philipp Furler.Unsere allgemeinen Datenschutzrichtlinien fin

data.text: 2 Swiss companies + 1 pioneering collab = enough material for a podcast🎙Our CEO Dieter Vranckx joins Philipp Furler, CEO of @Synhelion, in the latest "ecozentrisch" episode to talk about how our companies found each other & what drives them personally:▶️ https://t.co/bqfwQi7RyH https://t.co/MrnULwTFak

This winter, we will be expanding our route network to offer you an attractive and even more varied range of destinations.✈️ New to the SWISS network will be Bristol in Southern England. Find our new winter timetable below & let us know your favourite destination. 🌎🌍🌏 https://t.co/64EQ3p0lHw

2/2: As of now you can also take advantage of the new SWISS Air Rail international rail/air connection between Munich Hauptbahnhof & Zurich Airport via Bregenz. 🇩🇪🇦🇹🇨🇭
You can also relax even if your train is delayed – we will simply rebook you on a later connection. @sbbnews

urls.title: SWISS Air Rail
urls.description: Find out more about SWISS Air Rail between Lugano, Basel SBB and Zurich Airport. The fare is included in your flight ticket from Basel or Lugano.

data.text: 1/2: We’re expanding our SWISS Air Rail network: Bellinzona, Bern, Fribourg & Lausanne are now bookable for better connections to Zurich airport. The Geneva-Zurich airport connection runs via Biel, which reduces the total travel time to less than 3hrs: https://t.co/URBAIRA7al🚄✈ https://t.co/7grD22Ow42

We have completed the installation of our Premium Economy Class on our Boeing 777 fleet. 💺 Our aircraft mechanic Pablo captured the refurbishment of the first Triple Seven, HB-JNH, from start to finish and shows what the last few months have looked like in the hangar. ✈️ https://t.co/UWHyoMRVRd

urls.title: SWISS Travel Briefing - useful information at a glance
urls.description: Entry regulations Enquire about the entry regulations for your destination in good time. The authorities of some destination countries may require passengers to register online before arrival. Rebooking We currently offer enhanced rebooking options on many fares to give your greater flexibility with your travel plans. Travel insurance Find out about additional Covid-19 benefits from our insurance partners if you want even more security with your plans. Contact details Store your contact details under

data.text:

📱Digital services: https://t.co/nQfzLD3foc 
✈️Tips for your travel preparation: https://t.co/bTPWA51ntV
🌍Entry requirements:  https://t.co/YcsNtsVHBh
🧳Reporting of baggage delays: https://t.co/6s5mmFcq8B https://t.co/BhUQWEWX6z

No matter in which direction, no matter how long the flight duration: our Instagrammer of the month Vanessa is living her childhood dream on board with us. On Instagram @flyswiss she explains her fascination with flying. ✈️ #flyswiss

urls.title: Refund FAQs | SWISS
urls.description: Frequently asked questions about refunds can be found on this page, together with answers.

data.text:
3/3: Those affected can find more information here:
Live updates on your flight booking: https://t.co/KGges1j3Aq
Information on rebooking options: https://t.co/11x5JyznLN
More about refunds: https://t.co/h6FWQFrGO8
2/3: But we’ll be able to offer the majority of affected passengers an alternative for the same day of travel. The cancellations amount to approx. 2% of our planned flight programme.

1/3: Due to the present situation in the airline industry with huge operational challenges, we’re proactively making further adjustments to our flight from AUG-OCT. We greatly regret these adjustments and offer our sincere apologies. https://t.co/YtC6qhuRuI

🤩✈️🌈📸What lucky shots📸🌈✈️🤩
#repostoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/QrGnhuCfPI

About these summer nights… 🌕☁️⚡️One of our A220s in front of a marvellous backdrop near Zurich Airport. But don't worry, the aircraft is like a Faraday Cage, so lightning is spectacular but harmless✨ Thank you @patmurphy747 for this great shot.
#repost #lightning #A220 https://t.co/9umWev7UEP

urls.title: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world
urls.description: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world. ✈ From check-in to disembarking - we place the highest value on hygiene and your health.

data.text: Flight operations are expected to return to normal in the course of the day. However, there may still be some irregularities. Please check your current flight status at https://t.co/rRZh3n4TWD.

Update: Swiss airspace has reopened and SWISS operations can now gradually resume. The first SWISS aircraft have already taken off and landed again, and the majority of the diverted aircraft are on their way to Zurich. https://t.co/hJWUczl2lM

SWISS is committed to finding solutions for the passengers affected by this challenging situation as quickly as possible. SWISS is monitoring the situation closely and hopes to be able to resume regular flight operations as quickly as possible.
The arriving long-haul flights are currently being diverted to various airports in neighboring countries, including Milan, Lyon and Vienna. Short-haul flights are currently not taking off.
Due to a technical issue at @skyguide, Swiss airspace is currently closed and therefore no arrivals and departures to and from Zurich and Geneva are possible.

urls.title: Proud @ SWISS » SWISS Blog
urls.description: This Pride Month June we'll explain, why a rainbow is more than a coloured light for us or how we strengthen our Pride Community internally.

data.text:
"We specifically try to break down prejudices & boundaries". Peer, from our internal "Proud@SWISS" network stands up for more visibility, inclusion & tolerance. Because "there can never be enough of that". ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜More about it: https://t.co/7e06qBAcsH 
#FlyLove #FlySWISS https://t.co/KVoF0hNoBn

urls.title: airportr
urls.description: Book your baggage pick-up or delivery up to 23 hours before your flight departure. On departure, choose a pick-up time, and all you need to do is pack your suitcase. On arrival, schedule your luggage delivery to your home or hotel at a time that suits you. On departure: a smooth, fast and comfortable start of your journey We collect your luggage from the address of your choice. It will then be secured and checked in, you simply have to collect it from the baggage conveyor at the destination airport.

data.text: No carrying, no queuing, no stress: That's our new baggage collection, check-in & delivery service with @AirPortr_. In Switzerland, we collect your bags and check it in for you. On your return to Switzerland, we deliver it directly to your home or hotel.🧳https://t.co/Xxbumoju5E https://t.co/aQe7Cuq4it
We wish you a weekend full of rainbows and sunshine. ✨✈️ #repostoftheweek #repost #flyswiss https://t.co/npVHe80MN5

urls.title: SWISS has terminated state-backed bank loan facility ahead of time
urls.description: SWISS has terminated its bank loan facility guaranteed by the Swiss Confederation before the end of the term.

data.text: We have terminated the state-backed bank loan facility ahead of time. “We are very grateful to the Swiss Confederation that, together with the banks, it provided SWISS and Edelweiss with the liquidity they needed during the COVID pandemic,” says our CEO. https://t.co/Nld1SEvSjj https://t.co/fZJ65Kkmzr

data.text:
How we plan to halve our CO2 emissions by 2030 compared to 2019? 🤔
We are aware that we still have a way to go, but important steps have already been taken. On the occasion of World Environment Day, we present a few of these. 🌏🌍🌎
#MakeChangeFly #WorldEnvironmentDay2022 https://t.co/FqF4xD1bgC

urls.title: SWISS Saveurs
urls.description: With SWISS Saveurs, we offer you a wide range of culinary delicacies for every palate on most fl ights. Our new culinary concept on flights from Zurich and Geneva is a reflection of our commitment to serving you meals that are regional and delicious. The selection includes a range of healthy alternatives, is made from regional ingredients and comes in sustainable packaging whenever possible. The range of fresh products was created by Switzerland’s world-renowned Confiserie Sprüngli, which can look back

data.text: Just in time for summer, our SWISS Saveurs menu got a new refreshing addition: Salmon Poké Bowl from @spruengli_  with soba noodles, caramelized aubergine, cucumber, pineapple and spicy mayonnaise🐟🍚 Check out the highlights from our menu here: https://t.co/7xuC65T4G0 https://t.co/BHC59cOJ6J

data.text:
For us, a rainbow is more than just a colourful light phenomenon🏳️‍🌈Our SWISSness comes in many different shapes & colours and during Pride Month we celebrate it in a special way: https://t.co/7e06qBAcsH. Happy take-off into Pride Month✈️🌈
#FlyLove #pridemonth2022 #HappyPride https://t.co/I0piIZ0hZT

data.text: A big THANK YOU to all our cabin crew members who ensure the safety and well-being of our guests on board every day ❤️ Happy International Flight Attendant Day ✈️ Enjoy an insight into Carlos' day-to-day work as an First Class Flight Attendant. #InternationalFlightAttendantDay https://t.co/nYVtWWXEAB
